result.Description: One tablespoon glycerine, one tablespoon rosewater and four tablespoon honey mix all in keep in a bottle, use this in daily morning and evening time on face, after 10 minuter wash your face, this helps when you are facing wrinkles problem
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena

result.Title: Treat skin by apple
result.Description: Boil one apple in water after that peel it and mash it, throw seeds and add one tablespoon honey and one tablespoon milk cream mix it and apply on face, after 15 minutes wash it by water, do this process regularly
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena

result.Title: Treat skin by banana and honey
result.Description:
• One tablespoon castor oil and five drops of honey mix properly in a bowl, and use this on face regularly you won't get wrinkles

  • Mash one banana properly, add half tablespoon honey and two drops of almond oil mix it and apply on face after 10 minutes wash it.
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena

result.Title: Treat skin by almond oil and egg
result.Description:
• Yellow part of one egg and one tablespoon almond oil and half tablespoon rosewater mix all three and make paste and apply on whole face and neck, after 20 minutes clean it with warm water

  • Add one pinch of salt in raw milk apply on face before bathing this can helps in wrinkles
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena

result.Title: How to save your skin by UV damages
result.Description: UV rays hurts skin and may cause wrinkles. when you go out always do proper safety of skin, when you reduce weight can cause wrinkles so try not to gain body weight, always checks what you are eating dont eat alot of junk food, go for walk daily and always keep your face clean, if you are not able to go for walk in morning then go for evening
result.Author: Megha Satogiya

result.Title: Importance of balanced diet
result.Description: For healhy and beautiful skin you have to eat balanced diet. In your diet always take protien, vitamin and minerals, if your body doesn't get proper nutrition can also cause wrinkles for that always take balance and nutritious diet that can make your skin glow
result.Author: Sakshi

result.Title: Loss by smoking
result.Description: If you want to keep your skin healthy always go for execise, if you don't execise your skin can get wrinkles, Smoking always affect your skin, if you smoke you will get wrinkles on face and neck. because of smoke your lips also get shrinked and black, chemicals in smoke also reduce the tightness of skin.
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena

result.Title: Acne Problem
result.Description: Teenagers generally affected by pimples, in this age body changes increase oily cells and create pimples on your face, other than that if you eat alot of oily and spicy food, wake till late night, and take alot of tea and coffee and cigeratte that can give you constipation, and irregular periods, and dandruff and mental stress that also create pimples on face
result.Author: Sakshi

result.Title: Treat acne by Musk Melon
result.Description:
• Seeds of musk melon can grind in cow milk and apply on face that reduces pimples

  • Nigella sativa grind in vinegar, apply on face in night before sleeping, and in morning wash it by cold water
result.Author: Renuka Satogiya

result.Title: Treat acne by licorice
result.Description:
• Licorice and Jijube seeds take in same amount and grind in little water and use it on face and neck

  • Saffron and red sandalwood mix and grind it and apply on face can help in pimples
result.Author: Himanshu Yadav

result.Title: Treat pimples by Nutmeg-SandalWood
result.Description:
• Bombax ceiba folks grind in milk and apply on face that helps in pimples. Nutmeg and red sandalwood mix in equal amount grind it with little water apply on pimples
  • Grind carom seeds in curd and apply on face, after an hour wash it with cold water that will reduce pimples
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena

result.Title: Treat acne by Mint
result.Description:
• Mint leaves paste apply on pimples, One tablespoon white radish juice and one tablespoon cucumber juice mix both of them and apply on face, after an hour clean it by cold water, do this method regularly helps reducing pimples
  • Seeds of java plum peel it and grind it make a paste and apply on pimples
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena

result.Title: Treat pimples by Neem Seeds
result.Description:
• Peel neem seeds and grind it make paste add little butter milk and apply on pimples.10-12 Buchanania lanzan seeds or chironji grind in milk and make paste, apply on pimples daily
  • Bark of mulberry grind in milk and apply on pimples
result.Author: Dr.Konica Saxena
